OK, here's linear
algebra lecture seven.

about vector spaces

and the column
space of a matrix.
What's in those spaces.

How do you describe
all the vectors

the idea, the definition,
into an algorithm.

Actually, with rows, I notice

So the third row

So, all that should

when I subtract
